name: RETROBUTION
description:
CONTROLS: Z - X - ARROW KEYS

Z - Jump / Zoom Text

X - Shoot / Advance Text

Arrow Keys - Move

Our beloved GameBoy has just awoken from slumber only to realize nobody plays him anymore! Fight your way through current gen consoles to preserve your legacy and exact your RETROBUTION! This game was made for GBJam 3. It was a ton of fun to make! I learned some new skills along the way and really pushed my limits being that this was only my second game.

Twitter @iCarbonsAndrew
